body.name: LEVOIT Air Purifiers for Bedroom Home, 3-in-1 Filter Cleaner with Fragrance Sponge for Better Sleep, Filters Smoke, Allergies, Pet Dander, Odor, Dust, Office, Desktop, Portable, Core Mini, White
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 17 hrs 58 mins
features: REFRESH & RELAX: If you struggle with allergies, low-quality sleep, congestion, or symptoms caused by pet dander, the Levoit Core Mini Air Purifier is ready to help you create a comfortable space

MATTER OF MINUTES: Breathe freely and sleep better as the air purifier uses 360° VortexAir Technology 3.0 and 3-stage filtration to ensure top-notch air purification, Operating Conditions Temperature: 14°–104°F / -10°–40°C
QUIET OPERATION: Sleep soundly without loud rattling coming from your air purifier. This little air purifier keeps noise levels as low as 25dB while keeping your space fresh
AROMATHERAPY: Struggling with pet odors or musty smells, Add a few drops of fragrant essential oils to the aroma pad to keep your space smelling great

GENUINE LEVOIT FILTERS: Only use genuine Levoit replacement parts to maintain the best performance (Search for Core Mini-RF or B09FK5PN4H). Off-brand filters are inconsistent, unreliable, and may damage the air purifier

SAVE SPACE: Tired of dragging a bulky purifier back and forth, Light, travel-friendly, and compact, the Levoit Core Mini Air Purifier (6.5 × 6.5 × 10.4 in) easily fits in any bedroom, office, or living room, creating less clutter and more fresh air
body.description: Note: The adapter is stored inside the air purifier; Power Adapter(Input): 100-240V 50/60 H Rated Power: 7W Noise Level: 25-44dB Dimension: 6.5 × 6.5 × 10.4 inch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great air purifier!
reviews.reviewText: omg love this air purifier so much! it’s compact, quiet if needed, and helps so much with my sinuses haha. i love that it has three modes, and can be quiet enough to sleep with. so easy to put together and works well. definitely recommend :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and efficient, good for white noise too
reviews.reviewText: Product came as advertised, and works great with no issues. Besides air quality, I use it for some white noise at night on the middle fan speed and it's a nice volume. The high fan speed is a bit loud but I can see some folks using that speed for sleeping too. The aroma pad is a nice touch, though it's no replacement for an actual essential oil diffuser. I don't run it constantly, I don't have pets, and the air quality where I am is decent already so I'm coming up on a year of using this, cleaning the pre-filter ocassionally, and the check filter light has never come on. I'll replace the filter eventually but in my case I've already gotten 2x the life out of filter than the expected average lifespan (4-6 months).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Symphony of Cleanliness and Fresh Air Elegance
reviews.reviewText: Greetings, fellow seekers of purified air and dreamy atmospheres,Embarking on the ethereal journey through the realms of ambient tranquility, I present to you the LEVOIT Air Purifier, a 3-in-1 marvel that transcends the ordinary and transforms your bedroom into a sanctuary of crisp, revitalizing air. This isn't just a purifier; it's a whispering breeze, a guardian against the impurities that dare to disrupt your restful repose.**A Symphony of Cleanliness**: Imagine a concerto where allergens, pet dander, smoke, odors, and dust are the unwelcome notes, and the LEVOIT Air Purifier is the virtuoso conductor orchestrating their swift departure. It's not just a purifier; it's a maestro of fresh air.**Fragrance Sponge Magic**: Ah, the aromatic dance of scents that lull you into a serene sleep. The included fragrance sponge is like a perfumed companion, elevating your sleep space with delightful essences that soothe and captivate. It’s not just a filter; it's an olfactory symphony.**Bedroom Ballet**: Portable, white-clad elegance that pirouettes seamlessly into any bedroom tableau. This purifier is not just a device; it's a choreography of form meeting function, a ballet of utility and aesthetics.**Desktop Dynamo**: Don’t be fooled by its compact size; this Core Mini packs a punch. It's not just a desktop accessory; it's a powerhouse that whispers promises of clean air, be it in your office nook or beside your bedside lamp.**Ease of Elegance**: The white expanse isn't just a color choice; it's a design philosophy. Simple, elegant, and harmonious. The LEVOIT Air Purifier is not just a device; it’s an aesthetic statement that complements your space.Now, skeptics may raise an eyebrow and question, "Is it merely an air purifier?" To them, I say, dear reader, it's not *just* an air purifier. It’s the silent guardian of your respiratory peace, the sentinel against the invisible invaders that threaten your tranquil realm.In conclusion, if you've ever wished to breathe in the purity of alpine breezes amidst the bustling chaos, the LEVOIT Air Purifier is your breath of fresh air. It's not just an addition to your space; it's a commitment to your well-being.To purified dreams, serene sleep, and the undeniable charm of air quality sophistication,Yours in nocturnal clarity and freshness,A sleep enthusiast who knows the sweet serenade of purified slumber.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s small and quiet. Seems to work
reviews.reviewText: This is one of those purchases where it’s kinda hard to know how much it’s improving your life. For sure it’s pulling dust out of the air but am I feeling any different as a result. I couldn’t tell you. Nothing really notable to mention since using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for office use!
reviews.reviewText: I put it on my office table and works perfectly. It's really quiet and has powerful wind. One of the best air purifiers I've used!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very impressed with this air purifier, especially for the price. Works great, fan is quiet, not too loud even on highest setting. It also looks real nice and is the perfect size, not too big, not too small.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well as advertised
reviews.reviewText: I'm happy with it so far. Simple to set up if you read the brief instructions. I have it in a fairly sizeable living room near the kitchen. It's quiet even on high speed, removes odors, and I can breathe a lot better. I haven't had it long enough to know how long the filter will be effective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Air purifiers
reviews.reviewText: Great for my office. Quiet and effective!

We have some exercise equipment in a spare bedroom and, well, the room had a bit of an odour. I ran this air purifier for less than a day and it freshened the room up completely! I keep it running on low, and it has stayed fresh for a couple months nowSome reviews have complained that it does not remove dust. I agree, but I don’t think the point of the product is to save you from dusting. It is to freshen the air, and for that, it works great!It is very quiet. On the lowest setting you can barely hear it. On the highest setting you can hear the fan but is not at all loud. It also has a nice unobtrusive design.

Tiene 3 velocidades, en la primera el ruido es imperceptible, 2 notorio y 3 ruidoso, cumple con la función, jamás me hubiese imaginado la cantidad de partículas que quedaron atrapadas en el filtro, punto negativo: tiene un compartimento para poner un aromatizante pero no trae ninguno incluído y no los he conseguido por ningún lado

Absolutely love this filter. Highly recommend. Use in the kids rooms. Bought myself a different brand and really really wish I had waited for this one to be back in stock. This is the best filter by far. If you have a few different ones in your cart and are trying to decide, THIS IS THE ONE!

reviews.reviewTitle: Worked for 6 months - then stopped working at all
reviews.reviewText: Turns on briefly then shuts down. Touch panel does nothing.

reviews.reviewTitle: Por lo que vale, no se puede esperar mucho
